tool_description: Evaluates protein structures for druggable binding sites, structural stability, and conformational dynamics to assess target feasibility for small molecule intervention.

protein_sequences.description: Protein amino acid sequences or UniProt IDs for structural analysis

structure_sources.description: Structural databases to search for protein structures

cavity_volume_threshold.description: Minimum cavity volume (Å³) for druggable pocket identification

error_messages: Invalid protein sequence: Protein sequences contain non-standard amino acids or invalid format.
Structure not found: No structural data available for provided proteins in selected databases.
Database access error: Unable to retrieve structural information from specified sources.
Invalid cavity threshold: Volume threshold must be between 50-1000 Å³.
usage: Input protein_sequences and select structure_sources. Enable binding_site_prediction and set cavity_volume_threshold for pocket analysis. Returns structural druggability assessment.

structure_availability.description: Whether experimental or predicted structure is available for each protein

binding_pockets.description: Number of potential binding pockets identified per protein

pocket_volumes.description: Volumes of largest binding pockets for each protein

structural_assessment.description: Overall structural druggability assessment and recommendations
